casechecker-delete-reason: Reason for speedy deletion request added to the template when bot marks a redirect for deletion because the redirect contains identical looking Cyrillic and Latin letters in its title %(target)s is the redirect target.
casechecker-delete-summary: Edit summary when bot marks a redirect for deletion because the redirect contains identical looking Cyrillic and Latin letters in its title
casechecker-rename: Edit summary when bot moves a redirect with mixed Cyrillic and  Latin letters to a new target
casechecker-replacement-summary: Short edit summary when bot edits pages and fixes usage of upper- and lowercase letters
